item.title: Generative art from emotions
item.description: I’ve been experimenting with p5.js, a JavaScript library for creative coding, and made a project that scans user-given text and draws varying color/intensity circles based on its associated emotions. Here’s a link to the final result in the p5.js editor. Replace line 3 of sketch.js with your own text and see what you get! (Results may vary.) Example Input: "Fear is a strange soil. It grows obedience like corn, which grow in straight lines to make weeding easier.
